import React from 'react' // import './CSS/LoginSignup.css' import './CSS/LoginSignp.css' import { useState } from 'react' const LoginSignup = () => { const [state, setState] = useState("Login") return (

{state}

{state==="Sign Up"?:<>}
< button>Continue {state==="Sign Up" ?

Already Have an Account {setState}}>Login here

:

Create an Account Click here

}

By continuing, i agree the trems and conditions

) } export default LoginSignup
